narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This 2nd pre-license inspection for a Class (cid:28)C(cid:29) license and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant's
representative.
Submit the appropriate license fee to the Eastern Regional Office. 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act
 
 
Exit interview conducted with facility employee and APHIS representative Kurt Hammel.
